kuqaleni Kwesiphequluli Engeza i-url yokusesha yangokwezifiso futhi ukhethe "Injini yokusesha yangokwezifiso" njengomhlinzeki wosesho Khetha injini yakho yosesho oyincamelayo noma
sethe ngokwezifiso Sula idatha yesiphequluli sakho noma unqume ukuthi iyiphi idatha\ezosulwa uma ushiya uhlelo lokusebenza Nquma ukuthi yiziphi izingxenye zesiphequluli\ezizoba ekuqaleni Shintsha ukuziphatha kanye ne-ui yohlelo lokusebenza ukuze
vumelane nezintandokazi zakho Ukuze ubonise ibhokisi lesihlungi cindezela isikhathi eside kusithonjana sebhukhimakhi ekubukezweni konke. Nquma ukuthi yiziphi izihlungi ozozisebenzisa Izilungiselelo zesiphequluli, lapho ungakwazi kuye ngokuthi
hlelo lwakho lwe-android lunikeze imvume. Nika amandla izithombe zenethiwekhi, Ukukhubaza kungase kube usizo
kulondoloza idatha yeselula nokulayisha iwebhusayithi ngokushesha Vumela amawebhusayithi ukuthi afinyelele indawo yakho. Amanye
amawebhusayithi e-{google, amamephu e-nav) adinga lokhu kunikwe amandla Londoloza umlando wamawebhusayithi avakashelwe Nika amandla i-JavaScript. Amawebhusayithi amaningi adinga
I-JavaScript ukuze asebenze. Kodwa
azo ziyaphumuza futhi zingasetshenziselwa ukuhlasela Nika amandla Amakhukhi. Amakhukhi angamafayela ombhalo amancane, agcinwe kudivayisi yakho. Amawebhusayithi asetshenziswa bona njengesibonelo ukugcina izilungiselelo zomsebenzisi. Kodwa zingasetshenziselwa futhi ukuqoqa umsebenzisi womuntu siqu idatha. Amakhukhi ezinkampani zangaphandle ahlala engasebenzi. Ibhokisi lokuqinisekisa uma
vala isiphequluli Ibhokisi lokuqinisekisa lapho uvala ithebhu Phinda uvule ithebhu uma ithebhu yokugcina ivaliwe esikhundleni sokuphuma esipheqululini Sebenzisa sonke isikrini lapho uskrola kuwebhusayithi uma ucindezela inkinobho yangemuva uzoshiya imodi yesikrini esigcwele Izithombe Amavidiyo Isiphequluli Sewebhu Isilayidi Sesithombe Olandelayo Ngaphambilini Usizo Izilungiselelo Izilimi Izinhlelo zokusebenza eziningi Linganisa Us I-Screen Mirroring Qiniseka ukuthi ifoni yakho ne-TV kuxhunywe kunethiwekhi efanayo ye-Wi-Fi. I-Wi-Fi Ixhunyiwe I-Wi-Fi Inqanyuliwe Okujwayelekile Xhumana Thumela Impendulo Okokufundisa Isetshenziswa kanjani? Ukusakaza Ikhwalithi yokusakaza I-Auto Stop Nciphisa ngokuzenzakalela Phambili Imodi yokuma Misa ividiyo uma ukuxhumeka\kokuhlosiwe kulahleka Fihla uhlelo lokusebenza lapho ukwenza isibuko kuqala Umumo wokusakaza Imodi yokulingisa Inqubomgomo yobumfihlo yokubonisa isikrini Inqubomgomo yobumfihlo Amadivayisi Asekelayo Bona ukuthi imaphi amadivaysi asekela ukwenza isibuko Itimu yombala Kumnyama Ukukhanya Okuzenzakalelayo Khetha Ulimi vala Isilayidi Sezithombe Isibuko Sesikrini Idivayisi yakho oqondiswe kuyo kufanele ibe kunethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi efanayo nale divayisi, ngoba i-Screen Mirror sithumela isikrini sakho. Sakaza isikrini sedivayisi yakho nge-Wi-Fi kukhompuyutha yakho, incwadi yokubhalela noma ithebhulethi. Ungakwazi futhi ukusebenzisa i-hotspot yedivayisi yakho (imodi yokusebenzisa ifoni njengemodemu) futhi uxhume idivayisi yakho eqondiwe ku-hotspot yakho. Vula isayithi kudivayisi yakho eqondiwe. Ngokuskena ikhodi ye-QR ukumiswa kokuxhumana kudluliselwa futhi ukwenza isibuko kuyaqala. Sicela uqaphele ukuthi Isibuko Sesikrini sisebenza kuphela lapho sisethwa kahle. Isibuko Sesikrini sisakaza isikrini sakho, kodwa hhayi amasiginali omsindo wedivayisi yakho. Uma uhlangabezana nanoma yiziphi izinkinga xhumana nathi. Jabulela ukusakaza-bukhoma okushelelayo nekhwalithi ephezulu
ngaphandle kokubelesela Xhuma nganoma iyiphi idivayisi ehlakaniphile futhi ujabulele
bonisa kunoma yisiphi isikrini Jabulela isiphequluli esiyimfihlo sangaphakathi nohlelo ngaphandle kwemikhawulo Ukusethwa kwesikrini I-Hotspot Yedivayisi Skena Ikhodi Ukusekela Qeda Izinqubomgomo Zethu Ukuvikela ubumfihlo bakho kubalulekile kithi. Sithemba ukuthi isitatimende esilandelayo sizokusiza uqonde ukuthi sibhekana kanjani nolwazi lomuntu siqu olukhonjwayo, ongasinikeza lona ngezikhathi ezithile nge-inthanethi (inkundla ye-Google Play).

Ngokuvamile. asiqoqi noma iyiphi i-PII kuwe uma ulanda izinhlelo zethu zokusebenza ze-Android. Ukucacisa, asidingi ukuthi abathengi bavakashelwe kuhlelo lwethu lokusebenza, asinayo ngisho neSeva ukuze sigcine i-PII enjalo.

I-Screen Mirroring isebenzisa i-Facebook njengomhlinzeki wezikhangiso. I-Facebook ifuna ukukhombisa izikhangiso ezihambisana nawe. Ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe sicela uvakashele
https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices.

Ukuphela kwesimo esingase sikwazi ukufinyelela kuso i-PII yilapho unquma ukusithumelela impendulo yakho nge-imeyili noma ukusinikeza iphutha. umbiko. I-PII esingase siyithole kuwe ekuleso simo ilinganiselwe kuphela egameni lakho, ikheli le-imeyili kanye nempendulo yakho yenhlolovo kuphela.

Ezimeni ezingenhla, siyaqinisekisa ukuthi i-PII yakho izosetshenziselwa kuphela ukuxhumana nawe nokuthuthukisa amasevisi ethu. Asisoze salusebenzisa ulwazi olunjalo (isb. igama lakho nekheli le-imeyili_ nganoma yiziphi ezinye izinjongo, njengokuqhubeka ukumaketha imikhiqizo yethu, noma ukudalula ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu kumuntu wesithathu ukuze uthole izinzuzo zentengiso.

Kufanele kuqashelwe ukuthi noma ngabe noma ukungasithumeli impendulo yakho noma umbiko wesiphazamisi kuwumzamo wokuzithandela ngokuphelele ngesinqumo sakho. Uma unokukhathazeka mayelana nokusetshenziswa kabi kwe-PII yakho, noma uma ufuna ulwazi olwengeziwe mayelana nenqubomgomo yethu yobumfihlo nokuthi isho ukuthini, sicela ukhululeke ukusithumelela i-imeyili. ku-screenmirroring.feedback@gmail.com, sizozama ukukunikeza izimpendulo ezicacile zemibuzo yakho ngesikhathi esifanele . Sicela ubhale impendulo yakho Ulwazi Lwesistimu yakho luzothunyelwa eMnyangweni wezobuchwepheshe we-Screen Mirroring Thumela nikeza impendulo I-imeyili engavumelekile inikeziwe Hlola ukuxhumeka kwakho kwe-inthanethi bhala lapha… Faka i-imeyili yakho (uyazikhethela) Ujabulele uhlelo lokusebenza? Linganisela umuzwa wakho usebenzisa i-Screen
Mirroring App. Hhayi manje Impendulo: Imodeli: Ibhrendi: Inguqulo ye-OS: Umkhiqizi: I-RAM: Thumela imeyili Khetha Isithombe Isikhungo Sosizo Ucingo lwami lubhajwa kokuthi "Ixhumeka" lapho ibhanqa ne-TV. Bekungisebenzela ngaphambili, kepha akusebenzi manje. Kubonisa ukuthi idivayisi yami ayisekelwe. I-TV yami iyi-TV endala futhi ayisekeli i-wi-fi. Isithombe esiku-TV simnyama, kodwa umsindo uzwakala. Uxhumano luzophazamiseka ngemva kwesikhashana. Ingabe ulwazi lwami lomuntu siqu noma idatha yeselula iphephe ngokuphelele? Qala kabusha i-Wi-Fi yefoni ehlakaniphile ubone ukuthi uxhumano luphumelele. Vala i-TV bese ukhipha intambo yayo yamandla kusokhethi futhi. Linda iminithi elingu-1 bese uqala kabusha i-TV. Nciphisa ibanga phakathi kwefoni yakho ne-TV. Isondeze. Uma ike yasebenza ngaphambili, khona-ke ingasetshenziswa futhi. Izinkinga eziningi zokuxhuma zingaxazululwa ngokuqalisa kabusha amadivaysi. Vele uqale kabusha kokubili ifoni yakho ne-TV, landela inqubo evamile yokuxhuma ukuze uzame kabusha. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ifoni yakho ngokwayo ayisekeli umsebenzi wokubukisa isikrini. Ungasebenzisa i-XCast ukusakaza ividiyo, umsindo nesithombe ku-TV. Nge-XCast, ungenza ezinye izinto ngefoni yakho ngenkathi usakaza ku-TV. Uma i-TV yakho isekela isixhumi esibonakalayo se-HDMI, sincoma ukuthi uthenge isamukeli sangaphandle ukuze senze isibuko sesikrini. Njenge-Chromecast, Anycast njll. Okunye okuqukethwe kuhilela ukuvikelwa kwe-copyright futhi akukwazi ukuboniswa kumadivayisi ezinkampani zangaphandle, njengeNetflix, Disney Plus njll. Ungalanda ividiyo noma ubheke insiza efanayo kwezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza ukuze uzame. Ungavula i-Smart Connect kuzilungiselelo zakho ze-Wi-Fi. Izosesha uxhumo olungcono lwe-Wi-fi njalo, futhi ihlale ixhumeka emuva naphambili. Sicela wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi i-Wi-Fi yeselula ne-TV iyi-SAM nesiginali engcono kakhulu. Ngeke sigade noma siqoqe noma yiluphi ulwazi ngawe kanye neselula yakho. Ungasakaza isikrini sakho ngaphandle kokukhathazeka. Isistimu ingase ikuxwayise ukuthi kukhona ingozi yokuphepha ngaphambi kokubukisa kwesikrini. Lesi yisikhumbuzo nje esijwayelekile, kuzoba njalo I-WI-FI ISIMANGALISO FAKA Faka Imanuwali Qiniseka ukuthi ifoni yakho ne-TV kuxhunyiwe\kunethiwekhi efanayo ye-Wi-Fi.
